    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d01592-98fc-401a-2d75-4d99c8ee573b#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Királyok imádása (Strozzi oltár)</string>
            <string language="en">Adoration of the Kings (Strozzi Altar)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verehrung der Könige (Strozzi Altar)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adoration des rois (autel de Strozzi)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adoration dos reis (altar de Strozzi)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Adoration dei re (altar di Strozzi)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λατρεία των βασιλιάδων (βωμός Strozzi)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adoración de los reyes (altar de Strozzi)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Gentile da Fabriano: Királyok imádása (Strozzi oltár), 1423, Firenze, Uffizi, 300 x 282 cm, tempera és fém rátétek, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Gentile da Fabriano: Adoration of the Kings (Strozzi Altar), 1423, Florence, Uffizi, 300 x 282 cm, tempera and metal overlay, wood</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">internacionális gótika,  oltárkép,  Firenze,  Gentile da Fabriano,  királyok imádása,  </string>
            <string language="en">internacional Gothic art,  altar-piece,  Florence,  Gentile da Fabriano,  Adoration of the Kings</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gentile da Fabriano: Verehrung der Könige 
(Strozzi Altar), 1423, Florenz, Uffizi, 300 x 282 Zentimeter, tempera 
und Metalldes testblattes, Holz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gentil da Fabriano : Adoration des rois 
(autel de Strozzi), de 1423, de recouvrement de Florence, d'Uffizi, de
300 x 282 centimètres, de tempera et en métal, bois</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Da Fabriano de Gentile: Adoration dos reis 
(altar de Strozzi), de 1423, de folha de prova de Florença, de 
Uffizi, de 300 x 282 cm, de tempera e de metal, madeira</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Fabriano di Gentile: Adoration dei re 
(altar di Strozzi), di 1423, della sovvrapposizione de Firenze, di 
Uffizi, da 300 x 282 centimetri, di tempera e del metallo, legno</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνική DA Fabriano: Λατρεία των βασιλιάδων 
(βωμός Strozzi), 1423, της Φλωρεντίας, Uffizi, 300 X 
282 εκατ., της επικάλυψης tempera και μετάλλων, ξύλο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Da Fabriano de Gentile: Adoración de los 
reyes (altar de Strozzi), de 1423, del recubrimiento de Florencia, de 
Uffizi, de 300 x 282 centímetros, del tempera y del metal, madera</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">internacional gotische kunst, Altar-Stück, Florenz, 
Gentile da Fabriano, Verehrung der Könige</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art gothique d'internacional, autel-morceau, Florence, 
Gentil da Fabriano, adoration des rois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte gothic do internacional, altar-parte, Florença, da
Fabriano de Gentile, adoration dos reis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte gotica di internacional, altar-parte, Firenze, da 
Fabriano, adoration di Gentile dei re</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γοτθική τέχνη internacional, βωμός-κομμάτι, Φλωρεντία, 
εθνική DA Fabriano, λατρεία των βασιλιάδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte gótico del internacional, altar-pedazo, 
Florencia, da Fabriano, adoración de Gentile de los reyes</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
